QuestData.Title: Trapping Evolved
QuestData.Description: The Nightborne are using magic for everything, even trapping.$b$bNighteyes saw them at work, laying down magical snares to capture prey rather than the kind our people use. $b$bBring me their traps so that I may study their make.
QuestData.RewardText: These devices are peculiar. They are like the traps our hunters use, but can magically attract and trap nearby beasts.
